string.name: cd_key_shift
string.translation_description: When 'Shift' key in the keyboard is pressed, this string is spoken up for accessibility

string.name: cd_key_up
string.translation_description: When 'Up' arrow key in the keyboard is pressed, this string is spoken up for accessibility

string.name: cd_key_left
string.translation_description: When 'Left' arrow key in the keyboard is pressed, this string is spoken up for accessibility

string.name: cd_key_right
string.translation_description: When 'Right' arrow key in the keyboard is pressed, this string is spoken up for accessibility

string.name: cd_key_down
string.translation_description: When 'Down' arrow key in the keyboard is pressed, this string is spoken up for accessibility

string.name: cd_key_chartype_to_kana
string.translation_description: When the keyboard is switched to the 'Kana' (Japanese phonogram) mode, this string is spoken up for accessibility

string.name: cd_key_chartype_to_abc
string.translation_description: When the keyboard is switched to the 'Alphabet' mode, this string is spoken up for accessibility

string.name: cd_key_chartype_to_abc_123
string.translation_description: When the keyboard is switched to the 'Symbol' mode, this string is spoken up for accessibility

string.name: cd_key_undo
string.translation_description: When 'Undo' key in the keyboard is pressed, this string is spoken up for accessibility

string.name: cd_key_symbol
string.translation_description: When 'Symbol' key in the keyboard is pressed, this string is spoken up for accessibility

string.name: cd_key_alt
string.translation_description: When the keyboard is switched into alternative symbol mode, this string is spoken up for accessibility

string.name: cd_key_alt_unmodified
string.translation_description: When the keyboard is swtiched back from alternative symbol mode to normal symbole mode, this string is spoken up for accessibility

string.name: cd_key_capslock
string.translation_description: When the keyboard is switched into caps lock mode, this string is spoken up for accessibility

string.name: cd_key_capsunlock
string.translation_description: When the keyboard is swtiched back from caps lock mode to normal mode, this string is spoken up for accessibility

string.name: cd_key_menu_dialog
string.translation_description: When the menu dialog is opened, this string is spoken up for accessibility. 'Open' is a verb.

string.name: cd_key_globe
string.translation_description: When the input method is switched to another, this string is spoken up for accessibility

string.name: cd_key_uchar_backspace
string.translation_description: When 'Backspace' key in the keyboard is pressed, this string is spoken up for accessibility

string.name: cd_key_uchar_linefeed

string.name: cd_key_action_done
string.translation_description: When 'done' key in the keyboard is pressed, this string is spoken up for accessibility

string.name: cd_key_action_go
string.translation_description: When 'go' key in the keyboard is pressed, this string is spoken up for accessibility

string.name: cd_key_action_next
string.translation_description: When 'next' key in the keyboard is pressed, this string is spoken up for accessibility

string.name: cd_key_action_previous
string.translation_description: When 'previous' key in the keyboard is pressed, this string is spoken up for accessibility

string.name: cd_key_action_search
string.translation_description: When 'search' key in the keyboard is pressed, this string is spoken up for accessibility

string.name: cd_key_action_send
string.translation_description: When 'send' key in the keyboard is pressed, this string is spoken up for accessibility. This key is used when the composed text will be sent like chat app.

string.name: cd_key_composing_done
string.translation_description: When 'submit' key in the keyboard is pressed, this string is spoken up for accessibility. This key is generically used when text composing is finished.

string.name: cd_key_kana_line_a
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button of Japanese A column (あ行: A, I, U, E, O) in the keyboard is pressed.

string.name: cd_key_kana_line_ka
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button of Japanese KA column (か行: KA, KI, KU, KE, KO) in the keyboard is pressed.

string.name: cd_key_kana_line_sa
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button of Japanese SA column (さ行: SA, SHI, SU, SE, SO) in the keyboard is pressed.

string.name: cd_key_kana_line_ta
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button of Japanese TA column (た行: TA, CHI, TSU, TE, TO) in the keyboard is pressed.

string.name: cd_key_kana_line_na
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button of Japanese NA column (な行: NA, NI, NU, NE, NO) in the keyboard is pressed.

string.name: cd_key_kana_line_ha
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button of Japanese HA column (は行: HA, HI, FU, HE, HO) in the keyboard is pressed.

string.name: cd_key_kana_line_ma
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button of Japanese MA column (ま行: MA, MI, MU, ME, MO) in the keyboard is pressed.

string.name: cd_key_kana_line_ya
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button of Japanese YA column (や行: YA, YU, YO) in the keyboard is pressed.

string.name: cd_key_kana_line_ra
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button of Japanese RA column (ら行: RA, RI, RU, RE, RO) in the keyboard is pressed.

string.name: cd_key_kana_modifier
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button of Japanese voiced sound mark (゛) in the keyboard is pressed.

string.name: cd_key_kana_line_wa
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button of Japanese WA column (わ行: WA, WO, N) in the keyboard is pressed.

string.name: cd_key_kana_punctuation
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button of Japanese punctuation mark (、 。) in the keyboard is pressed.

string.name: cd_key_uchar_katakana_middle_dot
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button of middle dot mark (・) in the keyboard s pressed.

string.name: cd_key_uchar_ideographic_comma
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button of Japanese comma character (、) in the keyboard is pressed.

string.name: cd_key_uchar_ideographic_full_stop
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button of Japanese period character (。) in the keyboard is pressed.

string.name: cd_key_uchar_katakana_hiragana_prolonged_sound_mark
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button of Japanese prolonged sound mark (ー) in the keyboard is pressed.

string.name: cd_key_alphabet_abc
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button of ABC characters in the keyboard is pressed.

string.name: cd_key_alphabet_def
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button of DEF characters in the keyboard is pressed.

string.name: cd_key_alphabet_ghi
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button of GHI characters in the keyboard is pressed.

string.name: cd_key_alphabet_jkl
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button of JKL characters in the keyboard is pressed.

string.name: cd_key_alphabet_mno
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button of MNO characters in the keyboard is pressed.

string.name: cd_key_alphabet_pqrs
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button of PQRS characters in the keyboard is pressed.

string.name: cd_key_alphabet_tuv
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button of TUV characters in the keyboard is pressed.

string.name: cd_key_alphabet_wxyz
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button of WXYZ characters in the keyboard is pressed.

string.name: cd_key_alphabet_capitalize
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button to capitalize alphabet characters in the keyboard is pressed.

string.name: spoken_use_headphone_for_password
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the system starts reading the characters in the passowrd field.

resources.string: Plug in a headset to hear password keys spoken aloud

string.name: cd_keyboard_fold_button
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button to expand/fold the candidate word list is pressed. More details are described in Page 33 of http://goo.gl/jLDD7P

resources.string: Change the size of candidate window

string.name: cd_close_symbol_window
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button to back to the keyboard is pressed.

string.name: cd_symbol_window_number
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button to go to the number keyboard is pressed.

string.name: cd_symbol_window_symbol
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button to go to the symbol keyboard is pressed.

string.name: cd_symbol_window_emoticon
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button to go to the emoticon keyboard is pressed.

string.name: cd_symbol_window_emoji
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button to go to the emoji keyboard is pressed.

string.name: cd_symbol_window_enter
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the enter key is pressed.

string.name: cd_symbol_window_backspace
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the backspace key is pressed.

string.name: cd_symbol_window_minor_history
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button to show symbol/emoticon/emoji history is pressed.

string.name: cd_symbol_window_minor_symbol_general
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button to show general symbols is pressed.

string.name: cd_symbol_window_minor_symbol_half
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button to show full and half width symbols is pressed.

string.name: cd_symbol_window_minor_symbol_parenthesis
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button to show parenthesis is pressed.

string.name: cd_symbol_window_minor_symbol_arrow
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button to show arrow symbols is pressed.

string.name: cd_symbol_window_minor_symbol_math
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button to show math symbols is pressed.

string.name: cd_symbol_window_minor_emoticon_smile
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button to show smile emoticon is pressed.

string.name: cd_symbol_window_minor_emoticon_sweat
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button to show sweat emoticon is pressed.

string.name: cd_symbol_window_minor_emoticon_surprise
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button to show surprise emoticon is pressed.

string.name: cd_symbol_window_minor_emoticon_sadness
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button to show sadness emoticon is pressed.

string.name: cd_symbol_window_minor_emoticon_displeasure
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button to show displeasure emoticon is pressed.

string.name: cd_symbol_window_minor_emoji_face
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button to show face emoji is pressed.

string.name: cd_symbol_window_minor_emoji_food
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button to show food emoji is pressed.

string.name: cd_symbol_window_minor_emoji_activity
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button to show activity emoji is pressed.

string.name: cd_symbol_window_minor_emoji_city
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button to show city emoji is pressed.

string.name: cd_symbol_window_minor_emoji_nature
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button to show nature emoji is pressed.

string.name: help_userdictionary_dictionary_name
string.translation_description: Label asking the user to input the dictionary name.

string.name: help_userdictionary_edit_word_value
string.translation_description: Label asking the user to input the word.

string.name: help_userdictionary_edit_word_key
string.translation_description: Label asking the user to input the reading (pronunciation) of the word.

string.name: cd_voice_input
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when voice input button is being pressed. Note that typically suffix 'button' is also spoken (e.g., 'Voice input button' in English).

string.name: cd_narrow_frame_widen_button
string.translation_description: This string is spoken up for accessibility, when the button to show the software keyboard is pressed. This button is available iff a physical keyboard is available.
